text: Nocardiopsis terrae is a Gram-positive, halophilic, facultatively alkaliphilic and obligately aerobic bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from saline soil from the Qaidam Basin in the Qinghai Province in China.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis terrae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Nocardiopsis terrae
